text: Kautokeino, or Guovdageainnu suohkan, is a municipality in Norway's northernmost county, Finnmark. Settlements include Guovdageainnu (village). ==Economy== Reindeer that are domesticated is the largest industry (as of 2003) in the municipality; That year there were 79,000 of those reindeer.https://snl.no/Kautokeino. SNL.no Retrieved 2024-03-23 Experimental search for minerals is being permitted for one company, for 7 years (as of 2024).https://www.nrk.no/sapmi/fatt-innvilget-undersokelsesrett-i- kautokeino-1.16816250. Retrieved 2024-03-23 Until the early 1990s, there was mining (for mineral)s in Bidjovagge. ==Administration== The municipal council is elected until late 2027. *5 council members are from Kautokeino Flyttsamelistehttps://www.nrk.no/valg/2023/resultat/fylke/56/5612. NRK.no. Retrieved 2023-09-27 *4 from Labour party *3 from Guovdageainnu S치milistu *2 from Samefolkets Parti i Karasjok *2 from 치rja *1 from Conservative party *1 from Fastboendes liste *1 from Venstre (Norway) *1 from Progress party *1 from Centre party (The 19 council members were elected during the 2023 Norwegian local elections.) ==Demographics== The inhabitants had the hightest rate of broken marriages (in the country, as of 2023), for those that are between 66 and 16-years old.https://www.nettavisen.no/okonomi/her-er-det-flest-som- skiller-seg-ikke-morsomt/s/5-95-1711164. Retrieved 2024-03-31 One has to be at least 18-years old, to get married, according to Norwegian law.https://www.regjeringen.no/no/tema/familie-og- barn/innsiktsartikler/ekteskap-og-samliv/mer-informasjon-om- ekteskap/id672620/#:~:text=Alderskrav.,samlivsbrudd%20ved%20brudd%20p%C3%A5%20alderskravet.
